list.title: Recipe#data
list.description: Called when the .data property is set on this element.

list.title: flipCard
list.description: Flips the card to reveal the other side with the relevant information (front side for picture and name, back side for description and interpretation info)

list.title: getCardNamesFromLS
list.description: Pulls JSON card strings from localStorage and parses them for use in updating card information

list.title: interpData
list.description: Overall Interpretation Information in JSON format

list.title: randomInterp
list.description: Returns a random interpretation given the values of the cards which determine how positive/negative a fortune will be

list.title: setCardProp
list.description: Sets card information using past, present, and future information. Iterates through the cards selected and sets their data using the JSON information.

list.title: shuffle
list.description: Shuffles the cards initially for the user to select from
